title: Is there any replacement for stenography? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is there any replacement for stenography? No, not in the same way Shorthand is learnt, practised and made an effective tool to make a career ! This is not a dying art, but just being less used now-a-days. Its unique qualities of fast noting down and transcription remain its speciality. Though voice to typing technique and softwares have become available now, it is only a machine gobbling the job market. It can't be considered a replacement if Stenography. It is an addition only. Stenography will survive the present, but not the future! For me, it is a pity and sad fact.
